archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.3.8e: e) performing follow-up activities, which may include conducting a root cause analysis to identify control weaknesses that need rectifying or other safeguards that can be implemented to prevent a recurrence.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
